title: Schedule Of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill Meetings Today, 6-18-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 18, 2009

 



Schedule Of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill Meetings Today, 6-18-09




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ______________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                June 18, 2009   SCHEDULE OF JUDGE SOTOMAYOR’S CAPITOL HILL MEETINGS  THURSDAY, JUNE 18 Today, Judge Sotomayor will visit Capitol Hill to meet with the following Senators: Senator Tom Coburn   Senator Bob Corker   Senator Johnny Isakson   Senator Lisa Murkowski  Senator Bernie Sanders ##
